page.title: 15CLAY PIGEON SHOOTING
page.content: {CLAY PIGEON SHOOTING} Our grid area is mainly agricultural land.The Fox hunt was disbanded in 1984.The one sport left now is clay pigeon shooting.The aim of the sport is to soot a clay disc ( known as a pigen)to dust with a high volocity shot cartridge.The clays are propelled from a spring loaded 'TRAP' that can drive them in different patterns._DOWN THE LINE_TEAL_SKEET_BULL TRAP_RABBIT JUMP.Hits are recorded on a card like this K=KILL,L=LOSS=MISS.Their are 3 types of guns and the most suitable is the 12 bore shot gun(2 types ,over and under,side by side)with skeet(no choke)boys &girls use the lighter gun like a 4.10&20 bore. Cartriges that we picked up in our area are:ELEY seven & a half, WINCHESTER seven & a half.Dark clays are called CC1 international WOC
